title: How to Turn Off My AI on Snapchat With Snapchat+

steps.title: Open the Snapchat app.
steps.content: Open the Snapchat app. This looks like a white ghost with a yellow background. If you aren't already logged in , tap Log in to do so now. You must be subscribed to Snapchat+ to unpin and remove My AI from the Chat feed. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the "Chat" icon.
steps.content: Tap the "Chat" icon. This is the text box icon on the bottom toolbar, to the left of the camera. You'll see a list of all your recently messaged friends. My AI will be at the top.

steps.title: Tap and hold My AI.
steps.content: Tap and hold My AI . A pop-up window will open.

steps.title: Tap Chat Settings.
steps.content: Tap Chat Settings . This will be underneath Avatar Settings .

steps.title: Tap Clear from Chat Feed.
steps.content: Tap Clear from Chat Feed . This will remove My AI from your Chat page. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Unpin My AI (optional).
steps.content: Unpin My AI (optional). If you only want to unpin My AI from your Chat Feed instead of getting rid of it entirely, do the following: Tap your Bitmoji to open your Profile . Tap the Snapchat+ banner at the top of the page. Tap the Pinned toggle next to My AI. It should now say Unpinned .

steps.title: Open the Snapchat app.
steps.content: Open the Snapchat app. This looks like a white ghost with a yellow background. If you aren't already logged in, tap Log in to do so now. If you don't have Snapchat+, you won't be able to turn off My AI. You'll only be able to clear My AI data.

steps.title: Click your Bitmoji.
steps.content: Click your Bitmoji . This will be in the top-left corner, regardless of what page you're on. Your profile page will open.

steps.title: Tap the cog icon.
steps.content: Tap the cog icon. You can find this in the top-right corner.

steps.title: Scroll and tap Clear Data.
steps.content: Scroll and tap Clear Data . You can find this underneath the Privacy Controls header.

steps.title: Tap Clear My AI Data.
steps.content: Tap Clear My AI Data . This is towards the bottom of the page. A pop-up menu will open.

steps.title: Tap Confirm.
steps.content: Tap Confirm . This will delete all the data from your past conversations with My AI. If you have conversations saved in your chat history , you'll need to unsave those first.
